title: The 48 Laws of Power
author: Robert Greene
description: The 48 Laws of Power is a guide to gaining and maintaining power. Drawing on historical examples and insights, Robert Greene outlines strategies for rising to power and avoiding pitfalls. The bookâ€™s format presents each of the 48 laws with practical advice on how to apply them in everyday situations, making it a compelling read for those interested in social dynamics, strategy, and influence.
